category.name: Interface.Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: FND_TraceLink_Report_Depth
preference.preference_description: Specifies the depth for the trace link report. The traceability report tree will be generated to the specified depth for both complying and defining trees. If the traceability report is also showing trace link objects, the depth of the report will be multiplied by 2. For example, if the preference value is 3 and the traceability report will contain 6-level deep trace report for trace links. The default value is -1. Setting -1 value gets all level deep traceability report.
